name: Dancing Snake-Animal Dash Game
description:
Tap, turn and slither in beautiful and dangerous geometric worlds. Let's dance with the music now!

Are you ready? Tap the screen to make a sharp turn, avoiding obstacles and reacting to the World changing before your eyes.

Features:
• 8 different roles(Snake, Santa Claus, Cats, Dogs, Pigs, Penguin...)
• 6 Amazing 3D stereo worlds, Common and Crazy mode
• Simple and smooth control
• Wonderful background music
• Well-designed graphics
